markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Celebrity Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1931) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 166 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Celebrity](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=54)

</column>

---

The more people you have looking at you, the more content you are, and you take every opportunity to show up others when their performances are less than perfect. You gain the Upstage reaction. In addition, when you [Earn Income](/Actions.aspx?ID=23), if the level of the task is higher than your level, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your check to Earn Income.

<document level="2" id="action-566" />

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the celebrity archetype.

<title level="2">Celebrity Dedication leads to...</title>
[Acknowledge Fan](/Feats.aspx?ID=4150), [Big Debut](/Feats.aspx?ID=4146), [Command Attention](/Feats.aspx?ID=1934), [Feeling Your Oats](/Feats.aspx?ID=4139), [Grudging Compliment](/Feats.aspx?ID=4141), [Mesmerizing Gaze](/Feats.aspx?ID=1933), [Never Tire](/Feats.aspx?ID=1932), [Statement Strut](/Feats.aspx?ID=4145)
name: Celebrity Dedication
